title: Oklahoma executes John Hanson after Trump administration cleared way
shortDescription: Oklahoma had scheduled John Hanson's execution for Dec. 15, 2022, but the Biden administration blocked his transfer from federal custody to the state.

title: Trump's battle with Newsom, California grows beyond immigration
shortDescription: Trump will sign disapproval resolutions under the Congressional Review Act to bar California's plan to end the sale of gasoline-only vehicles by 2035

title: 'He's lost it': Newsom slams Trump's mental acuity in immigration feud
shortDescription: California Gov. Gavin Newsom questions Trump's mental and physical ability as their clash over immigration enforcement rages on.

title: 'A dangerous place': Trump pulling some US staff from Middle East
shortDescription: The State Department said it had "ordered the departure of non-emergency U.S. government personnel due to heightened regional tensions.”

title: David Hogg exits DNC after new vice chair election is called
shortDescription: David Hogg, who was at the center of controversy over his efforts to primary incumbents in Congress, is leaving the Democratic National Committee.

title: Newsom says Trump use of troops is ‘theater, madness': Updates
shortDescription: The sweeps have fueled six days of protests resulting in hundreds of arrests in Los Angeles and the demonstrations have spread across the nation.

title: How PBS is rallying supporters as Congress weighs funding cut
shortDescription: A PBS campaign is urging viewers to contact Congress in support of federal funding for public broadcasting.

title: Democratic governors to spar with House GOP over immigration
shortDescription: The hearing focuses on so-called "sanctuary" jurisdictions.

title: Trump gets DOJ approval to shrink, abolish national monuments
shortDescription: If presidents can establish a national monument under the Antiquities Act, they can also remove them, Justice Dept. says in a blueprint for action.

title: Trump met with boos, cheers at Kennedy Center
shortDescription: President Donald Trump attended "Les Miserables" at the Kennedy Center after overhauling its leadership and naming himself chairman.

title: Trump's $5 million 'gold card' website is open. But there's a waitlist
shortDescription: The president has said the card would replace the 'EB-5' immigrant investor green card visa program

title: Photos show military vehicles in Washington DC ahead of parade
shortDescription: Preparations are underway for the U.S. Army's parade in Washington D.C., which also falls on President Donald Trump’s 79th birthday.

title: 'Vicious' killer's execution, blocked under Biden, is moving ahead
shortDescription: Oklahoma had scheduled John Hanson's execution for Dec. 15, 2022, but the Biden administration blocked his transfer from federal custody to the state.

title: Trump administration proposes to slash power plant pollution limits
shortDescription: Critics say they are concerned that EPA’s actions do not consider the impacts of pollution on public health

title: Fulbright board resigns, citing interference by Trump administration
shortDescription: All members of the board that oversees the U.S. State Department's Fulbright Program have voted to resign.

title: Musk called Trump before his public apology
shortDescription: Elon Musk reached out and talked privately to President Donald Trump before the billionaire entrepreneur apologized for his harsh personal attacks.

title: As the dust settles on Musk and Trump's fight, what about the GOP bill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Elon Musk appear to be making up after a very public fight following Musk's opposition to Trump's bill. Does he support it?
